name: The Way of Fiction
description: Fictional literature often gets a bad rap in so called places of higher learning, but in the words of a favorite author, Anything you can do in nonfiction, I can do in fiction, and I get to have Dragons!

name: The Dichotomy of Good and Evil
description: Is the Devil necessary? My positions is, No, Satan is absolutely not necessary. In fact, it is his very lack of necessity that makes him evil. For if he were necessary, how could he possibly be inherently evil? He is a jerk, simply out to make other peoples lives more miserable than they already are, quite unnecessarily so.
